첫 번 째 후보군: stop trying to steal someone else’s man.

원문: 이 정도에 꼬리를 말 거면 왜 시비를 거는지 몰라.
첫 번 째 후보군: why did she start a fight if she was going to back down so easily?
두 번 째 후보군: I don't get why someone would pick a fight only to back down this easily.

원문: 정신 차려. 어제는 이보다 더 했잖아.
첫 번 째 후보군: get a hold of yourself. you’ve seen worse than this.
두 번 째 후보군: Get a hold of yourself. Yesterday was even worse.

원문: 네가 하는 거랑 내가 하는 건 느낌이 다르다고….
첫 번 째 후보군: it’s different when you do it...
두 번 째 후보군: The way you do it and the way I do it feel different.

원문: 그래도 그냥 입술에 가볍게 했을 뿐이잖아?
첫 번 째 후보군: but it was just a light kiss on the lips.
두 번 째 후보군: But it was just a light touch on the lips.

첫 번 째 후보군: you must prepare to leave tomorrow!
두 번 째 후보군: You must prepare for the expedition tomorrow!

첫 번 째 후보군: we’ll take a short break here!
두 번 째 후보군: We'll take a short break here!

원문: 도착할 때까지 유니스 영애와 같은 마차는 절대 못 탈 거야
첫 번 째 후보군: I’ll never be able to ride in the same carriage as lady eunice until we arrive.
두 번 째 후보군: I'll never be able to ride in the same carriage as Lady Eunice until we arrive.
Is that such a big deal?

첫 번 째 후보군: it is a big deal to me.

원문: 좀 친해져서 유니스의 힘을 확인하려 했단 말이다.
첫 번 째 후보군: I wanted to get closer to eunice so I could check her powers.
두 번 째 후보군: I wanted to get closer to Eunice to check her powers.

원문: 그런데 코앞에서 사람 협박하고, 사랑과 전쟁을 실시간으로 찍어버렸네…
첫 번 째 후보군: but I ended up threatening someone and having a dramatic love-hate relationship right in front of her...
두 번 째 후보군: But I ended up threatening someone and acting out a dramatic love-hate relationship for all to see...

첫 번 째 후보군: I wonder what she thinks of me now...
두 번 째 후보군: I wonder how my image has changed...

첫 번 째 후보군: do you like her that much...?
두 번 째 후보군: Do you like that lady that much...?

원문: 티 파티 이후로 우리를 볼 때마다 발그레 해지는 것도 그렇고.
첫 번 째 후보군: she blushes every time she sees us after the tea party.
두 번 째 후보군: She blushes every time she sees us after the tea party.

첫 번 째 후보군: I made him so he could date her...
두 번 째 후보군: I set you two up to be together, and now look at this...

원문: 너희 둘이 사랑을 해야 유니스가 각성을 하고 세계를 구한다고….
첫 번 째 후보군: eunice has to fall in love with him so she can awaken and save the world...
두 번 째 후보군: You two need to fall in love for Eunice to awaken and save the world...

원문: 그 방법이 안 될 것 같으니,
첫 번 째 후보군: but it doesn’t look like that’s going to happen,
두 번 째 후보군: Since that method doesn’t seem to be working,

원문: 이번에 가는 죽은 땅에서 뭔가 힌트라도 얻길 바라는 수밖에….
첫 번 째 후보군: so I’ll have to find some clues in the dead lands...
두 번 째 후보군: Looks like I'll have to find some clues in the dead lands this time...

원문: 시그렌, 나 잠깐 어디 좀 다녀올게!
두 번 째 후보군: siegren, I’m going somewhere for a bit!

첫 번 째 후보군: I’m going to rescue a damsel in distress!
두 번 째 후보군: I'm off to rescue a damsel in distress!

원문: 혼자 있으니까 조금 마음이 편해지는 기분이야.
첫 번 째 후보군: I feel more at ease now that I’m alone.
두 번 째 후보군: I feel a bit more at ease being alone.

원문: 행렬에는 사람이 너무 많아서 괜히 지쳐….
첫 번 째 후보군: there are too many people in the procession, so it’s exhausting...
두 번 째 후보군: There are too many people in the procession, and it’s unnecessarily exhausting…

첫 번 째 후보군: what are you doing here, miss?
두 번 째 후보군: Miss, what are you doing here?

첫 번 째 후보군: do you want to play with us?
두 번 째 후보군: How about playing with us for a bit?

첫 번 째 후보군: now, now. don’t be like that.
두 번 째 후보군: Now, now. Don’t throw a tantrum.

첫 번 째 후보군: they don’t seem to recognize eunice and me.
두 번 째 후보군: They don’t seem to recognize me and Eunice.

첫 번 째 후보군: then I’ll have to show them who we are.
두 번 째 후보군: Then I'll have to show them who I am.

첫 번 째 후보군: you don’t have to get your hands dirty, my lady.
두 번 째 후보군: My lady, you don’t have to get your hands dirty.

원문: 권터 씨네 사람인 줄은 미처 몰랐습니다.
첫 번 째 후보군: I didn’t know she was with you, sir.
두 번 째 후보군: I didn’t realize they were Gunter’s people.

원문: 아가씨는 놔드릴 테니 한 번 봐주시죠.
첫 번 째 후보군: I’ll let her go, so please forgive me.
두 번 째 후보군: I'll let the lady go, so please look the other way.

첫 번 째 후보군: we’ll be going now that we’ve returned the lady--
두 번 째 후보군: We'll be going now that we've returned the lady.

원문: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
첫 번 째 후보군: I’ll suffer humiliation from the duke if I let you go like this.
두 번 째 후보군: If I let you go like this, I’ll suffer humiliation from the duke.
Cut off what’s between their legs?
